A Commitment to Accessibility

Our Proof of Compliance (POC) Certificate demonstrates that your website meets key accessibility standards, ensuring usability for all visitors, including those with disabilities. At Kaffeinated Kodemonkey, we specialize in ADA and WCAG compliance, providing certification that establishes trust, enhances user experience, and supports legal requirements.

Get Started Today – Partner with the experts in digital accessibility and secure your POC Certificate.

What is a Proof of Compliance (POC) Certificate?

A Proof of Compliance (POC) Certificate is an official validation that your website meets essential ADA (Americans with Disabilities Act) and WCAG (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines) standards. This certification ensures compliance, while boosting usability and accessibility across all devices, making your digital space inclusive to all users.

Key Takeaway

  • WCAG Criteria: Your website will meet WCAG 2.2 standards, ensuring accessibility for a global audience.
  • Section 508 Compliance: We ensure full compliance with Section 508 of the Rehabilitation Act, crucial for federal agencies and public-facing organizations.
  • State and Local ADA Compliance: Our tailored approach addresses specific state and local ADA regulations, ensuring comprehensive regional compliance.

Benefits of the POC Certificate

  • Enhanced Brand Image: A POC Certificate communicates your commitment to accessibility, fostering trust and loyalty among users.
  • Improved User Experience: Accessible navigation ensures a smooth, engaging experience for all visitors, boosting user satisfaction.

  • SEO Optimization: Accessibility improvements enhance your website’s SEO, increasing visibility and reaching a broader audience.
  • Boosted Search Rankings: Meeting accessibility standards positively impacts search engine rankings, making your site more discoverable.
  • Long-Term Viability: An accessible website adapts to evolving digital landscapes, safeguarding your online presence for the future.

  • Streamlined Compliance: Our Certified A11y Developers, including DHS Trusted Testers, simplify compliance, reducing time and costs associated with ongoing accessibility updates.
  • Continuous Support: Benefit from ongoing support and regular updates to maintain accessibility compliance.

Ready to Elevate Your Digital Presence?

Partner with Kaffeinated Kodemonkey to secure your Proof of Compliance Certificate and make a meaningful impact on accessibility. Elevate user satisfaction, enhance brand trust, and broaden your audience reach with an SEO-friendly, fully accessible website.

Why Choose Kaffeinated Kodemonkey?

Our team consists of DHS Trusted Testers - Certified Accessibility Developers and with expertise in ADA compliance, WCAG, Section 508, and EN 301 549 standards. We bring a proven track record in partnering with government, education, and private sector clients to achieve and sustain accessibility compliance.

  • Certified Expertise: Our developers hold DHS Trusted Tester certifications, demonstrating a deep, validated knowledge of accessibility standards and requirements.
  • Customized Solutions: Every POC Certificate we provide is tailored to your unique needs, ensuring effective, ongoing compliance.

Always Remember

Automated testing does not replace manual testing. Only a human can determine if a website is ada compliant.
The combination of a Certifed A11y developer and an A11y Platforme will set your team and project apart form others.
